entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:17 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
